data.thought: S28|H|S27|Observatory Phenotype E1: 'Thinking Out Loud' Display. From SPEC-SRC-001 future enhancements: 'Stream agent's notebook reading progress through Observatory for real-time thinking out loud display'. Notebook reads codebase, streams comprehension to Observatory at human-readable pace. User watches AI 'understand' their code. Observable: file-by-file navigation, highlighted sections, emerging mental model. Use case: onboarding, code review, debugging sessions. Makes AI reasoning transparent.
